title: shrI mA dEvadEvA (sj)
sahitya:
shrI mA dEvadEvA endan tAyAi vandE tA param enakkaruL


1:  vAnulagattOr vaNangum parishuddhanE bhuviyil nAn paNindunai tudikka
 caraNam 2    parattai ninaittu bhavattai munindun padattil vizhundu manadil kanindu paNindunait-tudikka
 caraNam 3    tAyena unaip-paNindEn malam tanai nugar nAyena ninaittiDil pughaliDam piridillai
 caraNam 4    Adaritt-ayyA aruL mazhai peivAi aruNiraigunrE ahamkuDi koNDE
aruLin vazhiyum tarum un oLiyum pera tiru karattil tAngi bhuviyil kAkka aruL puri
 caraNam 5    tEDi vanda enai nADi nindaiyara kUDi cintai magizhvAga enru edir
ODi vanda un kOlam sollik-kavi pADip-pOTra ini AbirAmukkaruL
 caraNam 6    bAdhakanAna nAn AriDam ODuvEn parAparandAnunI bAdhalamUDunI
paramporuLE padam paNindE (unait-tudittEn padamaruLE) paranE suranE 
karuNAkaranE param bhuvi tozhudiDum parishuddhat-tiruttuvanE
